Package com.google.errorprone

Class ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager

java.lang.Object
com.sun.tools.javac.file.BaseFileManager
com.sun.tools.javac.file.JavacFileManager
com.google.errorprone.ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable, JavaFileManager, OptionChecker, StandardJavaFileManager
public class ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager
extends com.sun.tools.javac.file.JavacFileManager
An in-memory file manager for testing that uses JavacFileManager and Jimfs.

  • Constructor Details

    • ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager

      public ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager()
      Constructs an ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager instance.

      Instances constructed with this constructor may not use the forResource(String) method to create a JavaFileObject from a source file on disk. If you wish to use that method, use the ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager(Class) constructor instead.

    • ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager

      public ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager​(Class<?> clazz)
      Constructs an ErrorProneInMemoryFileManager instance, given a class that can be used to lookup file resources, such as test inputs to compile.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class to use to locate file resources
